# Recommended Further Reading Materials

Forta, B. (2015, July). Learning SQL [Video]. Pearson / O’Reilly. https://learning.oreilly.com/videos/learning-sql/9780134193700/9780134193700-LSQL_00_Introduction/

Harris, J. K. (2019). Statistics with R: Solving problems using real-world data. SAGE Publications.

Jaggia, S., & Kelly, A. (2018). Business statistics: Communicating with numbers (3rd ed.). McGraw-Hill Education.

James, G., Witten, D., Hastie, T., & Tibshirani, R. (2013). An introduction to statistical learning: With applications in R. Springer. Springer Texts in Statistics.

Lutz, M. (2013). *Learning Python* (6th ed.). O'Reilly Media, Inc.

Zhao, A. (2021). *SQL Pocket Guide* (4th ed.). O’Reilly Media. Retrieved from https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/sql-pocket-guide/9781492090397/ch03.html.
